category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Cfg0CreateVariantRuleType
preference.preference_description: Specifies the type of Variant Rule object that will be created in Product Configurator based variant configuration. The specified value must be be a valid Variant Rule type or its sub-type. The Valid Values: - VariantRule: When user saves a variant configuration from Product Configurator Variant Configuration view or Saved Variant Rules view, an instance of Variant Rule will be created. This is the default value. - Cfg0VariantCriteria: When user saves a variant configuration from Product Configurator Variant Configuration view or Saved Variant Rules view, an instance of Variant Criteria (Cfg0VariantCriteria) will be created.
